category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_auto_delete_folder_references
preference.preference_description: Deactivates the display of error messages when deleting an Item referenced anewhere else present under any folder. By default its value is "true" and that means, user does not want to get any error message when he delets any Item present under Folder even tough Item has some references.
